text:
NOTE: I'm not 100% sure that this is the bug, but it looks like inappropriate 
behaviour. It occurs on Win NT and Linux for final release 3.2.1. I also 
observered this for earlier releases on Win NT.
PROBLEM: When I sign my servlets in web.xml as load-on-startup corresponding 
servlet class and all classes that it uses are doubly loaded in JVM. If in 
static block of servlet class I call some other classes they are loaded twice 
too. If one of that classes derives from Thread I have doble threads. And so on.
I observed all this with standard jdb debugger on Win NT.
Please help.
creator: cher@protec.kiev.ua

text:
That is really not a bug.
It was due to double contexts.
creator: cher@protec.kiev.ua
